entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023
